mapper.select: select ui.id, ui.name, ui.nickname, u.reg_dt, u.ban_flag, if(u.ban_flag = 1, '정지', '정상') as state, count(rp.result_code) as cnt from user_info ui inner join user u on ui.user_code = u.code left join reply rpy on u.code = rpy.user_code left join report_reg rr on rpy.code = rr.reply_code left join report_proc rp on rr.code = rp.reg_code -- where rp.result_code = 1 group by ui.id order by u.reg_dt;

select ui.id, ui.name, ui.nickname, rp.dt, u.ban_flag, if(u.ban_flag = 1, '정지', '정상') as state, if(count(rp.result_code) is not null, count(rp.result_code), 0) as cnt from user_info ui inner join user u on ui.user_code = u.code left join reply rpy on u.code = rpy.user_code left join report_reg rr on rpy.code = rr.reply_code left join report_proc rp on rr.code = rp.reg_code where rp.result_code = 1 group by ui.id having cnt = 3 order by rp.dt;

select d.id, d.name, d.nickname, d.dt, u.ban_flag, if(d.code is not null, '탈퇴', '정상') as state, count(rp.result_code) as cnt from user u join `drop` d on u.code = d.user_code left join reply rpy on u.code = rpy.user_code left join report_reg rr on rpy.code = rr.reply_code left join report_proc rp on rr.code = rp.reg_code group by d.id order by u.reg_dt;
